channel.title: Hyp's stuff
channel.description: Programming, languages, compilers, procedural generation, etc.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Some time ago I stumbled upon a very unique blog. I read some of the posts and looked at the screenshots, and was amazed by the things the creator has done. The blog that I am referring to is the [Procedural World](http://procworld.blogspot.com/) blog.
